byline.contributor: Nicola Clark reported from Paris, and Rick Gladstone from New York. Nour Youssef contributed reporting from Cairo.
byline.original: By NICOLA CLARK and RICK GLADSTONE

abstract: Egyptian government announces discovery of sunken wreckage of EgyptAir Flight 804 in Mediterranean.
lead_paragraph: A search vessel in the Mediterranean found “several main locations of the wreckage” of Flight 804, the Egyptian government said.

headline.main: EgyptAir Flight 804 Wreckage Reported in Mediterranean
headline.print_headline: Searchers Report Finding Wreckage of Egyptian Jet

snippet: A search vessel in the Mediterranean found “several main locations of the wreckage” of Flight 804, the Egyptian government said.
